page.title: 19A Summary of the work done.
page.content: Our area consisted mainly of Sea and Coastal land with about a fifth of the town to the North.Of this part of the town most of the buildings are residential. We first investigated some of the prominent historical features in our area which are still in existence, we then worked out what amenities were available to people now.In order to get some idea of how people lived we prepared and conducted a survey in the area of Seaford closest to the Cuckmere.This, and our item count, show that Seaford is an area for retired people, and those that do work, tend to work outside the town. In our local news section we noted two things that a large number of people are concerned about, namely new housing and the state of the promenade.
